sudo: false
language:
- php
- node_js
php:
- 5.5
- 7.0
node_js:
- stable
env:
  global:
  - WP_MULTISITE=1
  - PHANTOMJS_CDNURL='http://files.urldocs.com/share/phantomjs'
  - SITE_UUID='ecc3a39c-c237-415b-b8fc-b00f58e1eb69'
branches:
  only:
  - production
before_install:
- openssl aes-256-cbc -K $encrypted_e20a70004f31_key -iv $encrypted_e20a70004f31_iv
  -in dev-scripts/github_deploy_key.enc -out dev-scripts/github_deploy_key -d
- WP_VERSION=$( cat ./wp-includes/version.php | grep 'wp_version =' | grep -oE '[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*(\.[0-9][0-9]*)*(-[0-9a-z]*)*'
  )
- echo "WP_VERSION=$WP_VERSION"
install:
- export DEV_LIB_PATH=dev-lib
- if [ ! -e "$DEV_LIB_PATH" ] && [ -L .travis.yml ]; then export DEV_LIB_PATH=$( dirname
  $( readlink .travis.yml ) ); fi
- if [ ! -e "$DEV_LIB_PATH" ]; then git clone https://github.com/OWL-Labs/wp-dev-lib.git
  $DEV_LIB_PATH; fi
- set -x
- source $DEV_LIB_PATH/travis.install.sh
script:
- source $DEV_LIB_PATH/travis.script.sh
after_script:
- source $DEV_LIB_PATH/travis.after_script.sh
after_success:
- |
  #declare -r SSH_FILE="$(mktemp -u $HOME/.ssh/XXXXX)"

  # - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

  # Decrypt the file containing the private key
  # (Note: this is the same as what is generated by the Travis CLI at step 2.5)

#  openssl aes-256-cbc \
    -K $encrypted_e20a70004f31_key \
    -iv $encrypted_e20a70004f31_iv \
    -in "dev-scripts/github_deploy_key.enc" \
    -out "$SSH_FILE" -d

  # - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

  # Enable SSH authentication
  chmod 600 "$SSH_FILE" \
    && printf "%s\n" \
         "Host github.com" \
         "  IdentityFile $SSH_FILE" \
         "  LogLevel ERROR" >> ~/.ssh/config


     if [ $TRAVIS_BRANCH == 'production' ] && [ $TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST == 'false' ]; then
         git config --global user.name "Travis Owl"
         git config --global user.email "merenuou@gmail.com"
         ssh-keyscan -p 2222 codeserver.dev.$SITE_UUID.drush.in >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
         git remote add pantheonUpstream ssh://codeserver.dev.$SITE_UUID@codeserver.dev.$SITE_UUID.drush.in:2222/~/repository.git
         git fetch pantheonUpstream
         git merge -s ours -m "Merge changes from pantheon using the ours merge strategy" pantheonUpstream/master
         git push pantheonUpstream HEAD:master
     fi
deploy:
  provider: releases
  api_key:
    secure: 
  file: thatfile
  on:
    repo: OWL-Labs/WordPress-Pantheon
    branch: production
